A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A film that calls for the beauty of mixed feelings and ambiguity\, while leaving me with almost nothing to feel at all. I’m saddened by the direction of one of my most beloved and inspirational directors\, Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy’s choice. She made us believe her intentions all along were to make films for the franchises fans. The Last Jedi is truly the opposition of that sentiment and left me with confusion and disappointment. The whole time you watch it you wonder what’s wrong with it against it’s beautiful visual landscape. My hope is that the film will get better with time.
